Text.Page:
Had no trouble getting here, but now I'm blocked in!

I've got workers, materials, and tools for the rebuilding project, but between myself and them, the path is full of {@LinkCreature:31#1#ossugon frostwalkers} and {@LinkCreature:31#4#icy skeletal minions}. Need a damn federation soldier just toâ€”

Hey, you're a federation soldier! What are you waiting for? Clear out those undead for me so I can get this build underway.
Nice work, "feddie." Now it's time for me to get to work!
